author: patrickl
msg: Add instructions for getting watchdog sources

author: patrickl
msg: This patch starts up a copy of tomcat with the watchdog war files, runs watchdog against it, and shuts down tomcat afterwards. It uses the Launcher to run tomcat in the background, and puts the webapps, work, logs and conf directories in a tmp dir so as not to muck up the build.

author: patrickl
msg: More updates to match updates to build.properties.default
